attributes.action: ensure that all councils return fines collected from enforcing unlawful traffic and parking restrictions and prosecute those that do not comply
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently it was revealed that councils have been issuing fines for parking and traffic offences that were unenforceable. These were due to errors on the part of the councils and yet they will not return the money to it's rightful owners without forcing them through a long, drawn out appeal process.  This is illegal (unjust enrichment) and we ask that the Prime Minister takes action to ensure the return of the money or prosecution of councils that refuse.
